item.title: What's new: Run playbooks on incidents on-demand going GA in unified platform
item.description: Automation is a key facilitator for a SOC’s ability to save time and let the team focus on what matters most. We are happy to announce that the ability to run a playbook on incidents on demand is now hitting GA! Run playbooks as part of incident investigation and response Automation rules are incredibly useful for addressing tasks after an incident has been created.
